assertion.value: The authors have no relevant financial or non-financial interests to disclose.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The study was approved by the ethics committee of UT MD Anderson Cancer Center. This research study was conducted retrospectively from data obtained for clinical purposes.

assertion.value: We obtained a waiver of informed consent for the study.

assertion.value: No custom code or software was used for this study.
